org.mobicents.slee.container.component.validator
Interface Validator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProfileSpecificationComponentValidator, ResourceAdaptorTypeValidator, ResourceAdaptorValidator, SbbComponentValidator, ServiceValidator
public interface Validator

Start time:17:12:16 2009-01-30
Project: mobicents-jainslee-server-core
This is super interface for all validators. Validator asums that everything has been loaded into component - class objects are set accordingly, classloader has every needed class loaded. That is component class loader is capable of providing class definition for matched component. Validator task is only to validate SLEE constraints on classes, for istance to see if sbb abstract class has proper methods for event handlers, has initial event selector methods, definition of CMP fields, etc. Constraints are defined in xml descriptor. Validator does not validate references - ie. it does not check if referenced libraries are present, this is task of different class.

Author:
baranowb - Bartosz Baranowski , Alexandre Mendonca

Method Summary
 void setComponentRepository(ComponentRepository repository)
          Sets component repository - plase where all components are stored and can be referenced by ComopnentKey or XID
 boolean validate()
          Should return the same value for each call if components state has not been changed.
 

Method Detail

validate

boolean validate()
Should return the same value for each call if components state has not been changed. It checks component against xml.

Returns:
  • true - if component does not violate constraints
  • false - if component does violate constraints
